allow: Bash(do sed -i '' 's/var stream = compression_stream(dst_ptr: .none, dst_size: 0, src_ptr: .none, src_size: 0, state: .none)/var stream = compression_stream(dst_ptr: UnsafeMutablePointer<UInt8>?(nil), dst_size: 0, src_ptr: UnsafePointer<UInt8>?(nil), src_size: 0, state: UnsafeMutablePointer<Void>?(nil))/g' "$file" done)
